meaningMnemonic: Your <kanji>idea</kanji>s while <kanji>discerning</kanji> things show your <vocabulary>consciousness</vocabulary> and an <vocabulary>awareness</vocabulary> of your surroundings. You not only know that you have ideas, but you think about them and discern them.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
